description:
This tutorial demonstrates the use of VIROME for comparing viral metagenome libraries analyzed with the VIROME pipeline as well as comparative analysis of viral communities using the Quantitative Insights in Microbial Ecology package (QIIME). 

Wommack, K. E., J. Bhavsar, S. W. Polson, J. Chen, M. Dumas, S. Srinivasiah, M. Furman, S. Jamindar, and D. J. Nasko. 2012. VIROME: a standard operating procedure for analysis of viral metagenome sequences. Standards in Genomic Sciences 6:427-439 [PMC3558967] 

See site for more information.
authors: Jaysheel Bhavsar, Shawn Polson, K. Eric Wommack
guidelines:
See full video below for more information. 



Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mL0qRR1uYUM

components.data: The VIROME Comparinator will appear with a list of both private and public libraries.
components.name: Description

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 41 of Comparative metagenomic analysis using VIROME
source_data.annotation: QIIME can produce many outputs including rarefaction curves to compare alpha diversity pipeline.
source_data.thread_text: QIIME can produce many outputs including rarefaction curves to compare alpha diversity pipeline.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 41 of Comparative metagenomic analysis using VIROME
source_data.annotation: Can also run beta diversity pipeline to compare libraries in principal component analysis in the King viewer.
source_data.thread_text: Can also run beta diversity pipeline to compare libraries in principal component analysis in the King viewer.
